text: Need Matthew Taylor for Nando's campaign. Budget around $11,793, looking for 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x Twitter post, 3 x Media interview, 1 x Behind-the-scenes content. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
